name: Defenders On Deck
description:
A great evil is coming to destroy this village! Recruit a team of warriors to venture into the wilderness. Explore, fight monsters, discover treasures, and use your loot to upgrade your deck before the village is destroyed.

Defenders On Deck is a deckbuilding game where you explore the world to build a deck of cards made up of heroes, items, and treasure. Overcome the difficult terrain, heal your wounds, and contend with whatever events occur in the wilds to succeed.
